user_query: I am planning a trip to Asia and I need to convert my currency to the local currency of each country I will be visiting. Can you provide me with the current exchange rates for USD to Japanese Yen, Korean Won, and Chinese Yuan? Also, give me the exchange rates for Euro to Japanese Yen, Korean Won, and Chinese Yuan.

TaskList.description: Fetch current exchange rates for USD to Japanese Yen, Korean Won, and Chinese Yuan.
Fetch current exchange rates for Euro to Japanese Yen, Korean Won, and Chinese Yuan.
